item.title: Information Security Governance
item.description: Information Security (IS) Governance # Information Security (IS) Governance # Information Security (IS) Governance is the act of creating a plan on how company will protect information and making sure everyone will follow the plan. We can measure its effectiveness by metrics. Metrics must be SMART, where S = specific, M = measurable, A = attainable, R = relevant and T = timely. IS governance usually uses a framework and an array of supporting processes to ensure IS strategy is aligned with the business objective.
